description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Added unsupported pasted-file linkification in sessions for faster file recovery and navigation.
- Added Soul heartbeat dashboard and status APIs for better worker observability and health checks.
Fixes & polish
- Hardened Telegram routing and improved user-facing messaging behavior.
- Renamed Identities navigation labels to Messaging for clearer UX.
Packaging / ops
- Updated AUR packaging metadata.
- Bumped release version to v0.11.88.
